txt.en: Find a way out of the dwarf-vault.
'How did you solve that impossible riddle?!'
With the correct words spoken, a series of levers has appeared.
You have successfully opened the vault!
A group of treasure-seeking Orcs has descended upon the opened vault!
I am between the Gladden Falls. Say my name...
I am the Leader of the Greymaul Rebellion. Say my name...
Lúrthrok and his pilferers have been defeated!
They sing songs of me, but none have ever seen my doors. Say my name...
I am the Black Abyss. Say my name...
I am the Deathless. Say my name...
I am the start and end of the Greymaul Rebellion. Say my name...
You have been tasked with exploring a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.

'Well done, [placeholder]! You defeated that vile Orc, Lúrthrok the Grasping! I was worried when you became trapped in the vault. I am glad you are all right! Come, let us return to Hórin and report your success!'
Find a way out of the dwarf-vault
